title: Chest of Drawers
artistDisplayName: Attributed to John Dunlap (American, 1746–1792) and/or Samuel Dunlap (American, 1752–1830)
medium: Soft maple, eastern white pine, faux painted wood-grain
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Vance American Art Fund; purchased with funds provided by Carol W. Wardlaw and Jamee J. and Marshall Field; Americana Endowment Fund
